name: Dinner Tonight: Cod with Pesto
description: You’ll definitely have some leftover pesto if you make this whole recipe, but that’s kind of the point. Pesto freezes remarkably well, and can be thawed in moments. Since I had made a large batch a week before, I was...
recipeIngredient: 1 filet of cod or other white fish

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the grill or broiler. Rub about a tablespoon of olive oil over both sides the fish and season with salt and pepper.
Cook the fish on the grill or under the broiler until the flesh is white and flaky, about 3-4 minutes a side.

Meanwhile, combine the basil, pine nuts, garlic, and salt over medium speed in a food processor. When it’s a thick paste-like consistency, slowly pour in the olive oil. Turn off the processor and fold in the Parmesan. Season with the pepper.
Plate the fish and top with a dollop of pesto.
